tool_description: Tracks inventory, expiration dates, and usage of quality control materials across laboratory testing platforms.

material_id.description: Unique identifier for the control material

material_name.description: Name or description of the control material

minimum_threshold.description: Minimum quantity threshold for reorder alerts

error_messages: Invalid quantity: current_quantity and minimum_threshold must be non-negative numbers.
Invalid expiration date: expiration_date must be a valid future date in ISO 8601 format.
Duplicate material: A material with this material_id and lot_number combination already exists.
Missing required fields: material_id, material_name, lot_number, expiration_date, and current_quantity are required.
Storage temperature out of range: storage_temperature must be between -80 and 40 degrees Celsius.
usage: Provide material identification, lot information, quantities, and storage requirements. The tool maintains inventory records and generates alerts for low stock or approaching expiration.

tracking_id.description: Unique tracking identifier for this material entry

status.description: Current status of the material (active, low_stock, expired, etc.)

reorder_needed.description: Whether reordering is needed based on current quantity

usage_rate.description: Estimated daily usage rate based on historical data
